README_OTHER.txt - Mike Weiblen http://mew.cx/ 2007-06-23

Other prebuilt binaries and resources of potential interest to OSG developers

Prebuilt COLLADA binaries:
http://downloads.sourceforge.net/collada-dom/COLLADA_DOM_FX_RT_1.3.0_VC8.exe

The "Vega Town" OpenFlight database is bundled with Vega Player:
http://www.multigen-paradigm.com/support/sc_files/VegaPlayer_NT.zip
